topics.body:
Now sadly there is one thing about this model so far I don't like.

Some of the Joints are REALLY STIFF, like, stiff to the point of I feel if I force tug on them to hard they will break off.

Both the Thigh joints and the waste joint are like this. Is there a way to fix this?

Maybe its because it was in that cold casing too long. Maybe the air will relax the stiff joints.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5
